titles.title: To make illegal the sale, share or transfer of information acquired on the Internet with a pledge that it would not be released.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Trade, and Consumer Protection.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/10/2000--Introduced. Provides that selling on the Internet information acquired with a pledge that the information would be kept private and not released, or sharing or transferring such information to another on the Internet, shall be considered an unfair practice in or affecting commerce under the Federal Trade Commission Act.
